page.title: 20Transport The Country Car
page.content: A lot of people are concerned about the loss of bus links around north Essex. These have been replaced by Eastern National's "country car".These so called "country cars"(Peugeot 504S)cost Â£10,000.The cheapest single decker bus costs Â£40,000 and the double decker bus costs Â£70,000. The country car service is mainly for old age pensioners and one car families when the father takes his car to work. The villages which are going to be served with the "country car"service are:Great Tey, Little Bromley, Easthorpe, Fingringhoe, Little Bentley and Tendring.The "country car"service runs in and out of Colchester three times a day from 9:00 a.m.to 3:30 p.m. Mt. Bures will also be served by a "country car" service in the future.
